eventTitle: A Damn Fine Bridal Party for Marlena
planningNote: This is just a starting framework - adjust anything to fit what the group wants!

timeline.title: Section 1: The Mystery Begins (Intro)
timeline.description: Guests arrive knowing their character from the invite. Pick up packet at seat and open Envelope 1.
activities: Guests already know character from invite
Guests pick up packet at their seat
timeline.music: Twin Peaks Theme (Laura Palmer's Theme) - ambient
timeline.notes: Guests should feel welcomed and excited, not stressed. Keep it light and fun.

timeline.title: Section 2: Investigation (Mid)
timeline.description: Mingle, snack, talk, speculate. Open Envelope 2 at midpoint.
timeline.music: Twin Peaks soundtrack - moderate volume for atmosphere
timeline.notes: Let conversations flow naturally. The mystery should feel fun, not like work.

timeline.title: Section 3: The Web Tightens (Pre-final)
timeline.description: Call attention briefly, open Envelope 3, let new info circulate.
timeline.music: Dark, mysterious Twin Peaks theme (The Bookhouse Boys)
timeline.notes: Build suspense as the pieces come together.

timeline.title: Section 4: The Big Burn (Final)
timeline.description: Everyone gathers, opens Envelope 4 before cupcakes, then cupcake reveal ceremony.
timeline.music: Building dramatic music, culminating at reveal
timeline.notes: Practice the torch method beforehand! Safety first. Envelope 4 must be opened BEFORE cupcakes!

timeline.title: Section 5: Wrap-up
timeline.description: Very short recap, toast to Marlena, group photo.
timeline.notes: End on a high note! Make sure Marlena feels special and celebrated.

backupPlans.guestsStuck: Have pre-written 'anonymous tips' ready to drop if no one is making progress
backupPlans.guestsNotParticipating: Have co-host or planted guest who's enthusiastic to help draw others in
backupPlans.runningLong: Skip or shorten traditional shower activities at beginning
backupPlans.runningShort: Have extra games ready or extend investigation phase

momentsToCapture: If you feel like taking photos, do. If not, enjoy the vibes.
The Mystery Begins: Guests with their packets
The Investigation: Candid moments of friends playing detective
The Big Burn: That dramatic cupcake reveal moment
The Reveal: Reactions when the murderer is caught
The Residents: A big group photo with everyone in character
Marlena's Favorites: Opening gifts and favorite group moments
